modnlp.tc.parser
Class XMLHandler

java.lang.Object
  MinML2
      modnlp.tc.parser.XMLHandler
public class XMLHandler
extends MinML2

Handles events generated by a Reuters file through a SAX parser, and store the results as a ParsedCorpus object.

See Also:
NewsParser, Serialized Form

fatalError

public void fatalError(org.xml.sax.SAXParseException exception)
Report all fatal errors, and try to continue parsing.

Note: results are no longer reliable once a fatal error has been reported.

See Also:
ErrorHandler.fatalError(org.xml.sax.SAXParseException)
